casebody.data:
Carvel Gordon DILLARD, Petitioner-Appellant,
v.
Steve BROWN, Superintendent, Warner Creek Correctional Facility, Defendant-Respondent. A156060 Court of Appeals of Oregon. Submitted on remand November 21, 2018.
May 1, 2019 Jed Peterson filed the brief for appellant. Ellen F. Rosenblum, Attorney General, Benjamin Gutman, Solicitor General, and Kathleen Cegla, Assistant Attorney General, filed the brief for respondent. Before Ortega, Presiding Judge, and Egan, Chief Judge, and Schuman, Senior Judge. PER CURIAM

Reversed and remanded. Dillard v. Premo , 296 Or. App. 798 , --- P.3d ---- (2019).
